modules.description: Provides functions to split, concatenate, and inspect rope data structures, which are optimized for efficient string manipulation. Operates on tree-based representations of text, enabling efficient handling of large or frequently modified strings. Used to implement text editors and log processing systems where performance is critical.

This module offers text manipulation operations like insertion, deletion, and substring extraction on `piece_rope` structures, supporting UTF-32 indices and encoding conversions, while enabling undo/redo and file serialization. It handles statistical analysis, line-based processing, and extensible text folding across UTF-8, UTF-16, and UTF-32 encodings, suitable for applications requiring efficient large-text editing or format conversion. Use cases include real-time text modification, log file analysis, and cross-encoding data transformation.
